full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ME MCHOD KYI CHO GA 'KHYER BDE BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES ME MCHOD BYA TSUL MDOR BSDUS BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI SLOB MA DPYOD LDAN DBU MDZAD DGE SLONG RDO RJE MING CAN NAS PHYOGS 'DIR ME MCHOD KYI SROL KUN TU DAR YANG, MCHOD THABS YID BRTAN SU SHIG MI SNANG BAS KHUNGS LDAN 'KHYER BDE'I CHOG ZHIG CIS KYANG DGOS ZHES NAN DU BSKUL BA LTAR TSAD THUB KYI DAM PA GONG MA'I MAN NGAG GI PHYAG KHROS DANG SGO BSTUN TE, ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG SKYE 'GRO MANG PO PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
